briefdescription.para: Flush UART buffers before each test to ensure clean test isolation.

simplesect.para: true if flush successful, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Comprehensive UART testing suite for ESP32-C6 DevKit-M-1 (noexcept)

detaileddescription.para: This file contains a dedicated, comprehensive test suite for the EspUart class targeting ESP32-C6 with ESP-IDF v5.5+. It provides thorough testing of all UART functionalities including basic operations, async communication, flow control, advanced features, callbacks, and hardware-specific capabilities.
All functions are noexcept - no exception handling used.
